nodes.text: Can you imagine if Bible's had to be sold with the following label on them: 'This book contains material on God. God is a theory, not a fact, regarding the creation of the universe, the objective nature of ethics, and the source of all life. This material should be approached with an open mind, studied carefully, and critically considered.'

emoticon_xgood Hehehehehehe. That made me laugh, but you actually make a good point. They should have I AM JUST A THEORY written on them, otherwise kids will regard them as fact and then where will we be?
